text: This Chinese dialogue has some key vocabulary: computer (电脑), TV (电视), and TV program (电视节目) .小红：小明，你在家会干什么？小明：我会在家玩电脑游戏，你呢？小红：我喜欢在家看电视。小明：你喜欢看什么节目？小红：我喜欢看体育比赛。我最喜欢看篮球比赛了！小明：那周末我们一起看吧！小红：Xiao Ming, what will you do at home?小明：I will play computer games at home, what about you?小红：I like to watch tv at home.小明：What programs do you like to watch?小红：I like to watch sport contests. Watching basketball competitions is my favourite!小明：Then let’s watch together this weekend.1 – 小红喜欢在家干什么？a. 看电视b. 玩游戏c. 画画d. 看书2 – 小红喜欢看什么比赛？a. 足球b. 篮球c. 乒乓球d. 排球1. a2. bReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
